channel.title: [Tutorial] Detecting orientation of an Android device
channel.description:
Hey all :) I've written another tutorial on my site which could be pretty useful for those of you interested in Android game development.
[url=https://jamesmonger.com/post/detecting-orientation-of-an-android-device.html]Detecting orientation of an Android device[/url]
As always, I welcome feedback :)
